original_title: Sri Lanka’s Sandani Peiris clinches 2nd runner-up at Top Model of the World 2023
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka's model Sandani Peiris won the 2nd Runner-up title at the Top Model Of The World event held at the Sunrise White Hills Resort, at Sharm el Sheikh in Egypt.
Mexico's Mariana Macias was titled the Top Model of the World 2023 at the pageant while Colombia's Leicy Rivas Moreno won the 1st Runner-up title in the event which was held on Friday.
This was the 29th edition of the annual event, conducted by the World Beauty Organization (WBO)

Danilka German of Dominican Republic, Sandani Peiris of Sri Lanka, Mariana Macias Ornelas of Mexico, Looksorn of Thailand, Isabella Linnea Ahs of Sweden and Leicy Rivas Moreno of Colombia were featured in the final among 43 contestants during a 2-week competition.
